SegmentNumber.description: Unique identification number of the segment (DICOM tag 0062,0004). ONTOLOGY?

SegmentLabel.description: User-defined label identifying the segment (DICOM tag 0062,0005).

SegmentDescription.description: User-defined or ontology-defined description for the segment (DICOM tag 0062,0006). In the context of EUCAIM, specific ontology terms should be used.

SegmentationMethod.description: Type of algorithm used to generate the segment (DICOM tag 0062,0008).

AlgorithmName.description: Name(s) and version of the algorithm(s) used to generate the segment (DICOM tag 0062,0009). Mandatory if Segment Algorithm Type (0062,0008) is semiautomatic.

NumberOfAnnotators.description: Number of annotators involved in the annotation process.

AnnotatorType.description: List with the specific role(s) of the expert annotator(s).

Experience.description: Years of experience of the annotator(s). Can include multiple values (comma-separated).

SequencesUsedForSegmentation.description: Modality(s) or submodality(s) used to perform the segmentation.
SequencesUsedForSegmentation.example: T2w, ADC, CT, CT+PET NO ENCUENTRO LA ONTOLOGY
